info.author: Edgar Prufer
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
info.description:
pyHed it's a open-source framework to create desktop applications. It has a lot
of useful tool's that make a develop of a desktop application very simple and fast.
pyHed uses PyQt4, SQLAlchemy and ReportLab to create GUI forms, to connect with
many databases and to make report's. 
pyHed was designed to make the task of create applications a very easy work.
Take a look on the pyHed site (http://www.pyhed.com/index_us.html) to a full
description of all features.
info.keywords: desktop framework PyQt PyQt4 SQLalchemy ReportLab commercial applications
info.name: pyHed---Python-desktop-framework
info.summary: pyHed it's a open-source framework to create desktop applications
